definitions.text: a powerful small boat designed to pull or push larger ships

examples: The prisoner tugged at the chains
This movie tugs at the heart strings

definitions.text: strive and make an effort to reach a goal
examples: She tugged for years to make a decent living
We have to push a little to make the deadline!
She is driving away at her doctoral thesis
The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor
You'll have to lug this suitcase
The horse finally tugged the cart out of the mud
Each oar was tugged by several men
She tugged and wrestled with her conflicts
